nodes.bodyText: We run tests on 3.6, couldn't we set that here?
a bunch of things (nuitka, docker images, etc.) currently rely on 3.7 so keeping it for now
Is there a reason to have wheel installed separately instead of adding it to the --dev pipenv?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -21,7 +21,7 @@ jobs:
       - name: Install and test semgrep-core
         run: eval $(opam  env --root /home/opam/.opam --set-root) && cd semgrep-core && opam install -y . && make all && make test && make install
       - name: Install and test semgrep
-        run: eval $(opam  env --root /home/opam/.opam --set-root) && cd semgrep && export PATH=/github/home/.local/bin:$PATH && pip3 install wheel==0.34.2 && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && make test && make qa-test && make all
+        run: eval $(opam  env --root /home/opam/.opam --set-root) && cd semgrep && export PATH=/github/home/.local/bin:$PATH && pip3 install wheel==0.34.2 pipenv && pipenv install --dev && make test && make qa-test && make all

nodes.bodyText: I think no, let me try moving it.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -21,7 +21,7 @@ jobs:
       - name: Install and test semgrep-core
         run: eval $(opam  env --root /home/opam/.opam --set-root) && cd semgrep-core && opam install -y . && make all && make test && make install
       - name: Install and test semgrep
-        run: eval $(opam  env --root /home/opam/.opam --set-root) && cd semgrep && export PATH=/github/home/.local/bin:$PATH && pip3 install wheel==0.34.2 && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && make test && make qa-test && make all
+        run: eval $(opam  env --root /home/opam/.opam --set-root) && cd semgrep && export PATH=/github/home/.local/bin:$PATH && pip3 install wheel==0.34.2 pipenv && pipenv install --dev && make test && make qa-test && make all
